tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingsEnergyConsumptionData (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  consumption DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE GreenBuildings (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    energy_consumption FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ConsumptionData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    consumption_date DATE,
    consumption_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES GreenBuildings(building_id)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  electricity_usage DECIMAL(10,2),
  gas_usage DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_costs (
  cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  cost_date DATE,
  electricity_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  gas_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES energy_consumption(record_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_savings (
  saving_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_id INT,
  saving_date DATE,
  electricity_savings DECIMAL(10,2),
  gas_savings DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE building_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_id INT,
  metric_date DATE,
  energy_performance_score INT,
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);
